timeline.diffHunk: @@ -1,38 +1,46 @@ -#### master +# Downlord's FAF Client + + [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/FAForever/downlords-faf-client.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/FAForever/downlords-faf-client) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/FAForever/downlords-faf-client/badge.svg?branch=develop)](https://coveralls.io/github/FAForever/downlords-faf-client?branch=develop) -Please take a look at the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/FAForever/java-guidelines/wiki/Contribution-Guidelines) before creating a pull request -# Support development +The official client for [Forged Alliance Forever (FAF)](https://www.faforever.com/) -Post a bountie on GitHub Issues on Issue Hunt. You can promise money to developers that solve issues and they get awarded those if they fix the issue. +## Support development -[![Issue hunt](https://github.com/BoostIO/issuehunt-materials/raw/master/v1/issuehunt-button-v1.svg?sanitize=true)](https://issuehunt.io/r/FAForever/downlords-faf-client) +Post a bounty on Issue Hunt. You can reward and financially help developers that solve the issue. -# How to run +[![Issue hunt](https://github.com/BoostIO/issuehunt-materials/raw/master/v1/issuehunt-button-v1.svg?sanitize=true)](https://issuehunt.io/r/FAForever/downlords-faf-client) -1. Use AdoptOpenJDK 11 or Oracle JDK 11 (others might not work) -1. Clone the project with git -1. Open the project into IntelliJ Ultimate or Community -1. Make sure you have the IntelliJ [Lombok plugin](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/idea/plugin/6317-lombok-plugin) installed +## How to run +1. Use [AdoptOpenJDK](https://adoptopenjdk.net/) 11 (or above) or Oracle JDK 11 (others might not work)
